Game: Castle Crisis This is a version of the Atari coin-op game Warlords, designed to look and play as much like the coin-op version as possible. Use your shield to deflect fireballs away from your castle and towards your opponents. You can also capture fireballs and launch them at your opponents with even greater force. http://images.launchbox-app.com/bf8293e5-e948-43de-839d-f6b2d192b8c2.jpg <3dbox1>http://images.launchbox-app.com/1521d908-085d-429a-b3b6-ba923c216fdb.png</3dbox1> http://images.launchbox-app.com/a22adb72-41d7-402a-91c3-8accc99dfc45.jpg http://images.launchbox-app.com/60b50acc-a97d-4527-99c9-3d4f3044633b.jpg http://images.launchbox-app.com/1ec501a8-9a30-444b-9a1d-dc95dfbf5e32.png http://images.launchbox-app.com/a1419192-75bf-462a-99a3-2a1f50dc2fd4.png http://images.launchbox-app.com/20a48bf3-0d13-4bfb-815a-24410a70baef.PNG http://images.launchbox-app.com/400802d7-0a1a-449c-9b7c-bf1018a6108c.PNG AtariAge
